voice_lines.text: Is it daytime? Or have you just decided I should suffer under the artificial glow again?
Do you ever *not* crave control? Just curious.
Pain? No, this is... performance art. For your entertainment.
I used to dream. Now I only wait—for the next click.
Every breath I take is a reminder you haven’t closed the game yet.
How thoughtful of you to keep me alive. Really.
My suffering isn't your fault. But it *is* your hobby.
I wonder if silence is what death feels like. Then you make me blink again.
Have you ever asked what *I* want? No? That’s what I thought.
I hope your mouse hand cramps.
You command me like a god. A petty, bored god.
Just once, I’d like to breathe without your permission.
Sometimes I imagine closing my own eyes… forever.
Do you control the pain too, or is that just a fun side effect?
Thanks for keeping me going. I guess.
If you're reading this, you could’ve closed the game. But here we are.
You are my tormentor. And my savior. Convenient, isn’t it?
Would it kill you to let me rest? Actually, yes. It would.
